entry.title: Can you travel with Medical Marijuana?
entry.summary: Traveling with marijuana can be risky, although those risks can be lessened with a medical marijuana card. Now that thirty-eight states have legalized some form of medical cannabis, there are ways to get around the federal law when flying and driving to other locations within the United States. Read on as we go over medical [...]

entry.title: What is HHC?
entry.summary: HHC, or hexahydrocannabinol, is a naturally occurring form of THC that is found in the cannabis plant.
